content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property in a divorce case the applicant was awarded half of a building while the defendant was ordered to pay a portion of the costs incurred by the plaintiff the court also ordered the defendant to pay interim maintenance for their child and a stamp duty to the state budget the text does not provide specific details about the parties involved or the reasons for the divorce
